headline: Labaton Keller Sucharow LLP Announces Securities Class Action Lawsuit Filed Against West Pharmaceutical Services, Inc. and Certain of Its Executives
summary: Labaton Keller Sucharow LLP announces that, on May 5, 2025, it filed a securities class action lawsuit on behalf of its client the New England Teamsters Pension Fund against West Pharmaceutical...

headline: 3 Reasons WST is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: What a brutal six months it’s been for West Pharmaceutical Services. The stock has dropped 34.8% and now trades at $211, rattling many shareholders. This may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
